alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 12:24PM CDT until March 22 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL YAZOO COUNTY... At 1224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Midnight to near Yazoo City to near Little Yazoo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Myrleville around 1240 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bentonia. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
